title: Carbon footprint software
content: Footprint Manager offers a cloud-based reporting tool, supported by the Carbon Trust's expertise, which enables an organisation to measure, manage and reduce its carbon, energy, water and waste footprint. The cloud-based service enables businesses to easily centralise all recording processes for more efficient and effective monitoring and reporting.  No more sending and managing dozens of spreadsheets and updating sheets one at a time.  Data can even be linked to SAP or ERP systems, thus saving manual data entry.
